ROW.NAME: 日记帐数据
ROW.DATDSC: select (select nvl(b.pzh,a.pzh) from cw_pzb b where a.sbh=b.sbh and a.zth=b.zth and a.pzh=b.czxh) str_pzh, cwpch, dd, a.siseqno lsh, pzh, '记' pzlx, decode(qcbz,1,decode(MM,1,'上年结转','上月结转'),zy) zy, decode(jefx,'借',je,0) jfje, decode(jefx,'贷',je,0) dfje, nvl(ye,0) ye, nvl(yefx,'借') yefx,qcbz from cw_yhrjzb a,( select distinct sbh,zth,siseqno,nvl(max(mkjmbz),'nul') mkjmbz,max(fkbz) fkbz,max(dybz) dybz,max(dyr) dyr,max(dyrq) dyrq from cw_rjzb where sbh='[%sbh]' and zth='[%zth]' and yy='[%yy]' and mm='[%mm]' AND KMBH = '[%kmbh]' group by sbh,zth,siseqno) c where a.zth = '[%zth]'and a.sbh = '[%sbh]' and yy = '[%yy]' and mm = '[%mm]' and kmbh = '[%kmbh]' and a.sbh=c.sbh(+) and a.zth=c.zth(+) and a.siseqno=c.siseqno(+) --and nvl(c.mkjmbz,'nul')!='3' /*模块标志是未分款的不显示*/ and not (nvl(c.mkjmbz,'nul')='3' and nvl(c.fkbz,'0')<>'3') order by mm,dd,kmbh,qcbz desc,sxh

ROW.NAME: 查询期初余额数据
求起始凭证号
求科目数据
ROW.DATDSC: SELECT "CW_KMB"."KMBH", "CW_KMB"."KMMC" FROM "CW_KMB" WHERE ( "CW_KMB"."SBH" = '[%sbh]' ) AND ( "CW_KMB"."ZTH" = '[%zth]' ) AND ( "CW_KMB"."MJBZ" = '1' ) order by kmbh

ROW.NAME: 从明细表查起始凭证号
